sentences.en: Defense experts say joint projects are increasingly squeezed by budget pressures.
sentences.cn: 国防专家说合作项目正迫于预算压力越来越受到压缩。

sentences.en: He sees the proposal as more of a diplomatic gambit than a serious defense proposal.
sentences.cn: 在他看来，与其说这是一项精心筹划的国防动议，倒不如说是外交上的一着妙棋。

sentences.en: His defense, which seems credible on the evidence so far, is that the bank masked its skullduggery so completely that no regulator anywhere in the world could get a handle on it.
sentences.cn: 他的辩词(根据目前证据似乎可信)是:银行把它的偷天换日的做法遮掩得天衣无逢,全世界任何地方的监管人员都无法掌握.

sentences.en: In his defense he alleged temporary insanity.
sentences.cn: 他伪称一时精神错乱,为自己辩解.

sentences.en: NATO defense ministers wrap up their meeting in Brussels today.
sentences.cn: 北约各国国防部长今天圆满结束了在布鲁塞尔的会议。

sentences.en: Of course, we'll consult closely with our allies every step of the way, because the security and defense of our allies, both in Europe and Asia, is not negotiable.
sentences.cn: 当然，我们将在前行道路上就每一步骤与我们的盟国密切磋商，因为我们欧洲和亚洲盟国的安全与防卫是不容讨价还价的。

sentences.en: The accused has the right to defense.
The boy could have felt sorry for himself and become depressed, or he could have adopted hardened cynicism as a defense.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩本有可能自怜自哀、抑郁消沉，也有可能采取冷酷的愤世嫉俗态度来保护自己。

sentences.en: The Defense Secretary gave an upbeat assessment of the war so far.
sentences.cn: 国防部长对目前的战事给予了乐观的评价。

sentences.en: The press corps was primed to leap to the defense of the fired officials.
sentences.cn: 记者团获知信息后，立即声援被解雇官员。

sentences.en: The prosecution and defense were bandying accusations back and forth.
sentences.cn: 原告和被告你来我往，互相指责。

sentences.en: The testimony presented offered a strong case for acquitting her on grounds of self-defense.
sentences.cn: 当庭的证词为裁定她是正当防卫而无罪提供了强有力的证据。

sentences.en: The war has impacted the area with military and defense workers.
sentences.cn: 战争使那个地区挤满了军队和防御工程人员.

sentences.en: Their defense markets are too small to sustain economically viable production runs.
sentences.cn: 他们的国防市场太小，就经济可行性而言不足以维持生产。

sentences.en: Twenty eight percent of the federal budget is spent on defense.
We have already succeeded in working out ground rules with the Department of Defense.
sentences.cn: 我们已经成功地与国防部敲定了基本原则。

words.tran_cn: 卫冕的；防御中的；防守型的
可防御的；可辩护的；可拥护的
防御；防卫；答辩；防卫设备
防卫者，守卫者；辩护者；拥护者；卫冕者
防卫的可能性；可防御性

trans.tran_cn: 防御，国防，辩护（律师），答辩，防守（队员），卫冕赛
